Title: Renders candidates ineligible to receive public matching funds when such candidate has been found in a prior election cycle to have misused public campaign funds
Summary: Renders candidates ineligible to receive public matching funds when such candidate has been found in a prior election cycle to have knowingly and willfully misused public campaign funds or committed fraud, conversion or unauthorized personal use of such funds; states that such ineligibility continues until the candidate has repaid such funds, satisfied civil penalties, and complied with orders imposed as a result of such prior misuse of public funds.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to ineligibility to receive public matching funds due to the prior misuse of public funds
